mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum r, t.* from ( select b.*, r.c from boardnotice b left join ( select bno, count(*) c from REPLYNOTICE group by bno) r on b.no = r.bno order by b.no desc) t ) where r between #{start} and #{end}
